content: If you don't see a dialog, click the button below

comment.text: This translation key is used for a center-aligned text that appears below a button, prompting users to click the button if they don't see a visible dialog in a private rooms page. The text indicates where to find alternative action.

usage.context:
textAlign="center"
 className="privacy-rooms-text-dialog"
 fontSize="20px"
 fontWeight={300}
 >
 {t("PrivacyDialog")}.
 </Text>
 <Button
 onClick={onOpenEditorsPopup}
 size="medium"
 primary

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dialoq pəncərəsi görsənmirsə' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'If you don't see a dialog'. 'Pəncərəsi' implies a window, which isn't the intended meaning of 'dialog'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Əgər dialoq açılmayıbsa, aşağıdakı düyməyə klikəyin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'klikəyin' is a transliteration of 'click' and isn't standard Azerbaijani. While understandable, it's not ideal.

The term "παράθυρο διαλόγου" (parathyro dialogou) is a literal translation of "dialog window" which is less common and potentially confusing.  A more natural Greek equivalent for "dialog" in this context would be something like "μήνυμα" (minyma - message) or a more conversational term indicating a notification or popup.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν δεν βλέπετε ένα μήνυμα, κάντε κλικ στο παρακάτω κουμπί

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'usted,' which is more formal. A more common and user-friendly approach would be to use 'no ves'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Si no ves un diálogo, haga clic en el botón de abajo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'finestra di dialogo' while technically correct, is a more formal term than 'dialog' in the original English. A more natural translation would be 'schermata di dialogo' or simply 'dialogo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se non vedi un dialogo, fai clic sul pulsante in basso

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'click the button below' is too literal. A more natural Lao phrasing would be 'ກົດປຸ່ມຂ້າງລຸ່ມນີ້' (got puem khang lum ni).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກົດປຸ່ມຂ້າງລຸ່ມນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ja neredzat dialoglodziņu, noklikšķiniet uz tālāk esošās pogas' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase. 'tālāk esošās pogas' (the following button) is too formal and specific. A more natural translation would imply the button to access the dialog.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ja neredzat dialoglodziņu, noklikšķiniet uz pogas zemāk.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "fereastră de dialog" (dialog window) is a bit literal and less common than other options. "Dacă nu vedeți caseta de dialog" or "Dacă nu vedeți panoul de dialog" would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dacă nu vedeți caseta de dialog, faceți clic pe butonul de mai jos

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ඔබන්න' is a slightly informal/colloquial contraction of 'ඔබන්න'. A more formal/standard version might be preferable depending on the target audience and brand voice. While not strictly incorrect, it lowers the formality.

The translation 'Bir ileti görmüyorsanız, aşağıdaki düğmeyi tıklayın' is not a direct equivalent of 'If you don't see a dialog, click the button below'. 'İleti' translates to 'message' which isn't the same as 'dialog'. A more accurate translation would be 'Eğer bir iletişim kutusu görmüyorsanız, aşağıdaki düğmeyi tıklayın' or 'Eğer bir pencere görmüyorsanız, aşağıdaki düğmeyi tıklayın'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Eğer bir iletişim kutusu görmüyorsanız, aşağıdaki düğmeyi tıklayın
